title: Loot - All my skin shards missing
body:
Good morning/afternoon/evening.

Few weeks ago i bought 20 hextech box, got a lot of skin shards and i leave them. Today i logged in and all of them are gone. I had atleast 10-15 skins and they're disappeard completely.
What can i do now? Please help me.

Thank you

replies.body: Didnt lose any skin shards, they're still there, but my counter for the little purple thingies was 0 after coming back to the game after a few months of hiatus...  not sure how or why, sent a bug report with no answer.  Kinda sucks cuz I was really close to my hextech annie before and wasted money on those dang boxes and now I've gotta start all over.  I assumed it was something to do with the new client.  Doubt anyone got in, I use a very secure password that wouldn't be easily brute forced, and even if they did what on earth COULD they do with them to make them just disappear?  Didn't have extra boxes had the same amount, no extra skin shards or missing ones, just....the rare gemstones gone.  The only thing I can think of is that the data was somehow lost between clients, or was stored locally previously because I DID have to reinstall the game due to my Windows screwing up.

Thank you but i got an email today, it says my account banned because of violation in my account..They banned me until 2100. I ask for help and they ban me for almost 100 year. 
Now what? This is messed up....

Hmmmmm if it look like you're missing some of your hextech loot, there's a chance that someone may have found their way onto your account and possibly disenchanted them =\ . 

Reach out to us in our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), stay logged out while you do, and we'll be able to help secure your account.
